statements: DELETE FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 8 AND hand_width < 4;
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 101 AND hand_length < 7.5;
DELETE FROM employee_identities WHERE identity_verified = FALSE;
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE employee_id = 100 AND hand_length < 10.5;
DELETE FROM employee_identities WHERE identity_verified = FALSE AND employee_id IN (SELECT employee_id FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_width > 5.0);
DELETE FROM sensitive_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'withdrawal' AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM sensitive_transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2021-10-01' AND employee_id = '6ba7b810-9dad-11d1-80b4-00c04fd430c8';
DELETE FROM hand_geometry_measurements WHERE hand_length > 10 AND hand_width < 5;
DELETE FROM sensitive_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date < '2022-01-01';
